oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Martha White Grand Ole Opry - 1953-02-21
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The recording is of the Martha White Grand Ole Opry. The episode is hosted by Jud Collins. The tape features: Ernest Tubb (musician), Johnny and Jack (musical duo), Anita Carter (musician), the Crook Brothers (musical group), Tommy Sosebee (musician), June Carter (musician), the Carters (musical group), and Moon Mullican (musician). The recording is from February 21, 1953.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Jud Collins; Ernest Tubb; Johnny and Jack; Anita Carter; Crook Brothers; Tommy Sosebee; June Carter;The Carters; Moon Mullican
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Jud Collins introduces the Martha White Grand Ole Opry -- (00:05) Martha White Theme (Carter Sisters) -- (00:23) Collins introduces Ernest Tubb -- (00:43) Somebody Loves You (Ernest Tubb) -- (02:53) Tubbs discusses the upcoming schedule and introduces Johnnie and Jack -- (03:20) I Can't Tell My Heart That (Johnnie and Jack) -- (06:31) Collins performs a Martha White radio spot -- (07:48) Martha White Theme (Anita Carter) -- (08:09) Tubb introduces the Crook Brothers -- (08:19) Buck Creek [with square-dancing calls] (Crook Brothers) -- (09:51) Tubb introduces Tommy Sosebee -- (10:21) Till I Waltz Again With You (Tommy Sosebee) -- (12:42) Collins performs a Martha White radio spot -- (13:06) Tubb introduces June Carter -- (13:17) Tubb and Carter perform a comedy routine -- (15:26) Kaw-Liga (June and the Carters) -- (18:07) Beginning of part two of the tape -- (18:14) Tubb introduces Moon Mullican -- (18:37) Jambalaya (Moon Mullican) -- (20:50) Martha White Theme (Anita Carter) -- (21:10) Collins performs a Martha White radio spot -- (22:30) Martha White Theme (Anita Carter) -- (22:38) Tubb introduces "Dear Judge" -- (22:48) Dear Judge (Ernest Tubb) -- (25:30) Tubb introduces Johnnie and Jack -- (25:41) Don't Let the Stars Get in Your Eyes (Johnnie and Jack) -- (28:27) Tubb performs his outro statements -- (28:47) Biscuit Song (Carter Sisters) -- (29:04) Collins performs his outro statements -- (29:44) Collins performs his outro statement about Harvey's
